#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int
  N = 1000005;

int cnt[N];

int main()
{
  int n;
  scanf("%d", &n);
  
  int sum = 0;
  long long res = 0;
  
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    int ff;
    scanf("%d", &ff);
    res += (sum++ - cnt[ff]++);
  }
  printf("%lld\n", res);
  return(0);
}
